String.string: Speak with Elleon at Firebase Valor.
Find the cave southeast of Firebase Valor, and use the teleportal. Speak with Elleon.
Eliminate Garion to open the first gate.
Eliminate Adanok to open the second gate.
Eliminate Nadaim, Guardian of Epidemics, to open the third gate.
Operate the strange seal. [*Summons Gilgash's Pylon or Akakalash's Pylon*]
Investigate the Plagueheart. [*Eliminate Gilgash Guardian Rugriba or Akakalash Charty to summon the Plagueheart.*]
